summary.span: 表示一个触发器，它按条件应用属性值或执行操作。

span.span: Represents a trigger that applies property values or performs actions conditionally.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 定义对应于最终用户操作的属性，例如 `true` 当用户将光标悬停在上时设置为的属性或的 相应 属性 。defines properties that correspond to end-user actions, such as the property that is set to `true` when the user hovers the cursor over a or the corresponding property of a . 表示属性值和元素中的最终用户操作， 允许 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 样式基于这些最终用户操作更改属性值，所有这些操作都是从标记中进行的。Representing end-user actions in property values, along with the element, allows [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] styles to change property values based on those end-user actions, all from within markup. 当不再满足触发条件时，触发器更改的属性将自动重置为其以前的值。The properties changed by triggers are automatically reset to their previous value when the triggered condition is no longer satisfied. 触发器针对暂时性状态进行了优化，这些状态应更改并返回到原始状态，如 打开 和 打开 。Triggers are optimized for transient states which are expected to change and return to original state, such as on and on . 相关的必须是依赖项属性。The of interest must be a dependency property. 请注意，必须 在上指定和 属性，这样 触发器才有意义。Note that you must specify both the and properties on a for the trigger to be meaningful. 如果未设置其中一个或两个属性，则会引发异常。If one or both of the properties are not set, an exception is thrown. 对象的属性 只能包含 对象。The property of a object can only consist of objects. 将 子对象添加到 对象会将该子级隐式添加到 对象的 。Adding a child to a object implicitly adds it to the for the object. 对象不受支持;仅 支持 对象。 objects are not supported; only supports objects. 还有其他类型的触发器。There are other types of triggers. 允许你根据多个属性的状态应用更改。 allows you to apply changes based on the state of multiple properties. 允许你在事件发生时应用更改。 allows you to apply changes when an event occurs. 和 用于数据绑定属性。 and are for data-bound properties. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了一个名 为的可用于 控件的。The following example shows a named available to controls. 定义一个 元素，该元素 在属性为时更改按钮的属性 `true` 。The defines a element that changes the property of a button when the property is `true`. [!code-xaml[BtnStyles#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BtnStyles/CS/app.xaml#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个属性，该属性返回要与触发器的 属性进行比较的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the property that returns the value that is compared with the property of the trigger.

summary.span: 该比较是一项引用相等性检查。

span.span: The comparison is a reference equality check.

value.span: 一个 ，它返回元素的属性值。

span.span: A that returns the property value of the element.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的值与属性指定的值进行比较 。The value returned by this property is compared with the value specified by the property. 执行的比较是引用相等性检查。The comparison that is performed is a reference equality check. 如果两个值匹配，则关联的 将应用指定的属性值。If the two values match, then the associated s apply the specified property values. `ClassName.PropertyName`如果包含此触发器的样式或模板未设置属性，则使用语法来限定您指定的属性 `TargetType` 。Use the `ClassName.PropertyName` syntax to qualify the property you are specifying if the style or template that contains this trigger does not have the `TargetType` property set. 请注意，必须 在上指定和 属性，这样 触发器才有意义。Note that you must specify both the and properties on a for the trigger to be meaningful. 如果未设置其中一个或两个属性，则会引发异常。If one or both of the properties are not set, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例包含一个触发器，该触发器 在属性为时更改按钮的属性 `true` 。The following example contains a trigger that changes the property of a button when the property is `true`. 由于的 设置为 ，因此不需要 `Property` 用类名来限定属性（例如） `Property="IsPressed"` 。Because the of the is set to , there's no need to qualify the `Property` properties, for example, `Property="IsPressed"`, with the class name. [!code-xaml[BtnStyles#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BtnStyles/CS/app.xaml#2)]

exception.span: 不能包含引用 属性的 。

span.span: A cannot contain a that refers to the property.

exception.span: 使用 之后，就不能再对其进行修改。

span.span: After a is in use, it cannot be modified.

summary.span: 处理类型转换器为 对象的属性提供值的情况。

span.span: Handles cases where a type converter provides a value for a property of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是在类级别应用的特性所引用的方法 ，这意味着此方法将处理使用类型转换器设置值的所有尝试 。This is the method referenced by an applied attribute at the class level, which means that this method processes all attempts to set values of with a type converter. 通常不直接调用此方法。You do not typically call this method directly.

summary.span: 获取 对象的集合，这些对象描述当满足指定条件时要应用的属性值。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects, which describe the property values to apply when the specified condition has been met.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *ZeroOrMoreSetters**ZeroOrMoreSetters* 零个或多个 对象。Zero or more objects. 这不支持 对象。This does not support object. 当元素满足指定条件时，可以使用来应用属性值。A allows you to use s to apply property values when the element meets a specified condition. 例如，你可能想要在元素处于焦点时更改其背景色。For example, you may want to change the background color of an element when it is in focus. 如果多次设置同一属性，则将应用最后一个属性值。If the same property is set more than once, the last property value will be applied. 对象的属性 只能包含 对象。The property of a object can only consist of objects. 将 子对象添加到 对象会将该子级隐式添加到 对象的 。Adding a child to a object implicitly adds it to the for the object. 对象不受支持;仅 支持 对象。 objects are not supported; only supports objects. ## Examples 如上所述，将 子对象添加到 对象会将其隐式添加到 对象的 。As mentioned above, adding a child to a object implicitly adds it to the for the object. 在下面的示例中， `` 是隐式的。In the following example, `` is implicit. [!code-xaml[PhotoStoreDemoStyled#TriggerSettersRef](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PhotoStoreDemoStyled/CS/window1.xaml#triggersettersref)]

summary.span: 获取或设置对象的名称，该对象具有可应用关联的 setter 的属性。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the object with the property that causes the associated setters to be applied.
The default property is .

value.span: 如果此属性为 ，则根据此样式或模板所应用于的元素（样式化父级或模板化父级）计算 属性。

span.span: If this property is , then the property is evaluated with respect to the element this style or template is being applied to (the styled parent or the templated parent).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可将此属性设置为应用了) 的集合 (的集合中的任何元素的名称 。You can set this property to the name of any element within the scope of where the trigger collection (the collection that this is part of) is applied. 这通常是包含此的模板中的命名元素 。This is typically a named element that is within the template that contains this . 可以使用 [X：Name 指令](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive) 语法来命名对象。You can name an object using the [x:Name Directive](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive) syntax. ## Examples 使用属性的一种情况 是：所需的属性不是模板化父级的属性，如以下示例中所示：One scenario when you would use the property is when the property of interest is not a property of the templated parent, as in the following example: [!code-xaml[ControlTemplateExamples#TriggerSourceName](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlTemplateExamples/CS/resources/menu.xaml#triggersourcename)]

summary.span: 获取或设置要与元素的属性值进行比较的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value to be compared with the property value of the element.

summary.span: 该比较是一项引用相等性检查。

span.span: The comparison is a reference equality check.
The default value is .
See also the Exceptions section.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值与的属性所返回的属性值进行比较 。This value is compared with the property value returned by the property of the . 执行的比较是引用质量检查。The comparison that is performed is a reference quality check. 如果两个值相等，则关联的 将应用指定的属性值。If the two values are equal, then the associated s apply the specified property values. 请注意，必须 在上指定和 属性，这样 触发器才有意义。Note that you must specify both the and properties on a for the trigger to be meaningful. 因此，如果未指定一个或两个属性，则会引发异常。Therefore, if one or both of the properties are not specified, then an exception is thrown. ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例在 属性为时更改按钮的属性 `true` 。The following example changes the property of a button when the property is `true`. [!code-xaml[BtnStyles#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BtnStyles/CS/app.xaml#2)]
